description.short: Learn more about the people in your org and make valuable connections
description.full: Profile+ help you quickly find out who does what in your organization and learn about open positions. The ability to search by name, project, and expertise creates new opportunities for like-minded people to find one another and connect. The app's profile cards are flexible and simple to update right from within Microsoft Teams. Highlight what you feel is most important, list your current projects, and express your personality by adding video. Once you find someone you'd like to meet or collaborate with, it's easy to introduce yourself in chat, give that person a call, or schedule a Microsoft Teams meeting. Note: This app can be easily extended with Microsoft Power Platform to meet your org's needs.
